title: SXSW 2014 Font Meetup
content:
Are you attending SXSW Interactive this year? Want to meet up with others who have a passion for typography?

Join me at the SXSW Font Meetup this Friday.

Details:

Friday, March 7th  
3:30-4:30 p.m.  
Long Center, 701 W Riverside Dr

[http://schedule.sxsw.com/2014/events/event\_IAP995319](http://web.archive.org/web/20150221015731/http:/schedule.sxsw.com/2014/events/event_IAP995319)

If you'll be in Austin, but don't have a SXSW badge, this event is free and open to the public, so swing on by!

Hope to see you there!

Jim Kidwell  
Extensis
author: jkidwell
